New Records: Roston Chase scored 52 runs, Kyle Mayers scored 35 runs, and Tabraiz Shamsi took 3 wickets
Key Match Events: South Africa won by 3 wickets using the DLS method
Rain interrupted the match, reducing the target from 135 to 123
Roston Chase and Kyle Mayers formed an 81-run partnership for the third wicket
Alzarri Joseph and Andre Russell took crucial wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Aiden Markram described the West Indies total as'subpar'
Rovman Powell urged fans to view the team's performance positively despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Antigua
The Proteas were reduced to 15 for 2 in their powerplay
